events.message: Customer reported a car accident involving their vehicle on the highway around 7 PM yesterday.
The claim was categorized under Auto Accident after review of the initial incident details.
An insurance agent was assigned to manage the case and guide the customer through the next steps.
Customer received an acknowledgment of the claim submission and confirmation that processing has started.
Request sent for photos of the vehicle damage, police report, and driverâ€™s license to proceed with the investigation.
Customer submitted all requested documents including police report, vehicle photos, and repair estimates promptly.
The investigation team began analyzing the submitted documents and the circumstances surrounding the collision.
Investigation concluded confirming that the collision was the fault of the other driver with full documentation.
A settlement proposal was prepared and sent to the customer detailing coverage and compensation amounts.
Customer expressed satisfaction with the proposed settlement and the timely communication from the insurance agent.
The claim was officially approved by the claims manager following customer acceptance of the settlement offer.
Payment was processed and issued to the customer to cover the vehicle repairs as per the approved claim.
The claim case was closed successfully after confirmation that the customer received the payment and completed repairs.
All claim documents and correspondence archived for future reference and compliance with company policies.
